subject: Simsonn pedal order update
description_text:
Hey! Is there any update on order #
SSN5930?I havn’t got any parcel tracking info since january 9.

conversations.body_text: Hi Szemerédi Zétény,    We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

I would like to cancel my order due to the shipping delay.When can i get
refunded?

On Wed, 14 Jan 2026 at 07:22, service@simsonn.com

Or if there is any predictable shipping date i would like to know it before
cancelling the order so i could decide if it is in a reasonable time or not.

On Sat, 17 Jan 2026 at 16:52, Szemerédi Zétény <zetiszemeredi@gmail.com>
wrote:

> I would like to cancel my order due to the shipping delay.When can i get
> refunded?
>
> On Wed, 14 Jan 2026 at 07:22, service@simsonn.com
Hi Szemerédi Zétény,  ​I consulted the operation team, and it is expected that this batch of goods will be shipped around the 22nd.
